title: A vvoorke of Ioannes Ferrarius Montanus, touchynge the good orderynge of a common weale wherein aswell magistrates, as priuate persones, bee put in remembraunce of their dueties, not as the philosophers in their vaine tradicions haue deuised, but according to the godlie institutions and sounde doctrine of christianitie. Englished by william Bauande.
author: Ferrarius, Johannes, 1485 or 6-1558.
publisher: 1559. Imprinted at London, by Ihon Kingston, for Ihon Wight, dewllyng in Poules Churchyarde,
